briefdescription.para: Retrieve a SSH message from a SSH session.

parameterdescription.para: The SSH session to get the message.

simplesect.para: The SSH message received, NULL in case of error, or timeout elapsed.
This function blocks until a message has been received. Betterset up a callback if this behavior is unwanted.

briefdescription.para: Get the type of the message.

parameterdescription.para: The message to get the type from.

simplesect.para: The message type or -1 on error.

briefdescription.para: Get the subtype of the message.

parameterdescription.para: The message to get the subtype from.

simplesect.para: The message type or -1 on error.

parameterdescription.para: The message to release the memory.

memberdef.argsstring: (ssh_session session, ssh_channel channel, ssh_buffer packet, const char *request, uint8_t want_reply)
memberdef.name: ssh_message_handle_channel_request
